trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around February 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my girlfriends car after getting taco bell and on our way back we looked at the moon and saw something that almost looked like a star or satellite moving downward towards the moon. When it came lower its stopped and sort of wobbled downwards the out of nowhere disappeared. My girlfriend thought it was a satellite until it disappeared, we both sort of shrugged it off but are still a little curious about it.
